channel.title: How do you change lvl requierments?
channel.description:
all my barrows and dragon has lvl requierment of 1 and so dose my weapons
how do i change this? what do i do? what do i change on this code to make the lvl requierment? [code]item = 4214 Crystal_bow_full A_nice_sturdy_magical_bow. 505512.837455532 505512.837455532 699539.568589636 0 0 0 0 109 0 0 0 0 0 0 0[/code]
Thanks kilopy :):):):):)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 25, 2007, 10:30:25 AM[/size][hr]omg no one knows? wow

item.title: How do you change lvl requierments?
